Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.tartan.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The player for a game.

    Project: LG Exec Ed SDET Program 2018 Jeffrey S. Gennari Versions: 1.0 March 2018 - initial version
